otherNightReminder: Show a finger signal matching how correct the Fact Checker was yesterday, from 1 to 10.
name: Fact Checker
ability: Each night*, learn how correct you were from a scale of 1 to 10 yesterday.

otherNightReminder: If the Impersonator was "mad" that they were a particular good character yesterday, point to who it is. Point to any player if that character isn't in-play
name: Impersonator
ability: Each night*, if you were "mad" that you were a particular good character yesterday, learn who it is. If not in-play, this info is arbitrary.

otherNightReminder: If any players were mad they were the Organiser yesterday: Show one of those players' character tokens.
name: Organiser
ability: Each night*, learn the characters of a player who was "mad" they were the Organiser yesterday.

otherNightReminder: If a player was executed yesterday, they gain that player's ability.
name: Graverobber
ability: You learn the character and gain the ability of executees.

firstNightReminder: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
otherNightReminder: If the poisoned player died today or tonight: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
name: Manipulator
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player: you have their ability & they are poisoned. If they die, choose again.

jinxes.reason: If the Manipulator dies while poisoning the Damsel, the Damsel remains poisoned.

otherNightReminder: If the Shapeshifter was "mad" that a false statement was true yesterday, you might decide to make it come true.
name: Shapeshifter
ability: If you are "mad" that a false statement is true, it might become true.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Genocidaire. They point to a player. If that player is "mad" that they are their true character tomorrow, they die that night.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Genocidaire. They point to a player. If that player is "mad" that they are their true character tomorrow, they die that night.
name: Genocidaire
ability: Each night, choose a player: If they are "mad" they are their true character tomorrow, they might die that night.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Veraxillus. They point at a player: that player dies. If the Veraxillus was mad they were a character that acts tonight: perform that ability.
name: Veraxillus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you are "mad" that you are a particular character, you might gain their ability. If you do, you learn this.
